subtitle: pun jellies yoga aphorisms chapter three
powers we have now come to the chapter

aphorism Dharana is holding the mind
onto some particular object commentary
Dharana or concentration is when the

unbroken flow of knowledge in that
object is Deana commentary the mind

for some time it is called jnana

it and perceiving only the internal
sensations the meaning unexpressed in
any form that state of Dhyana is called

samyama commentary when a man can direct
